channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Control Parking Zone Sign spray painted over, 11th August
item.description:
Control Parking Zone sign covered over with spray paint. No parking space available for local residents or visitors as regular random cars occupy the parking area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Empress Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on the sidewalk, street and green surfaces, 11th August
item.description:
There is an unacceptable and embarrassing amount of litter and rubbish scattered all over the pavement and street in this area, both caked into grassy areas and flown about. Garbage is being blown around by the wind and passing cars, making the whole place look unsightly and neglected. This is not what we should expect given the council tax we pay. The situation makes the area look like it’s in severe decline, and it urgently needs attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Anerley Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting mess, 11th August
item.description:
Rubbish everywhere, weeds everywhere, no one cleans our estate , I’ve just cleaned communal area by lift it’s disgusting, what does our cleaner actually do

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
